title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for Oct. 11
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for Oct. 11
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his "Stock of the Day" Hudson Technologies (HDSN). Hudson Technologies Inc.'s shares are headed for their biggest loss this year after preliminary third-quarter results proved disappointing. The refrigerant company said revenue was about $25 million, well below the average estimate of $41 million among analysts in a Bloomberg survey. Hudson expects earnings of no more than 5 cents a share, half the average projection.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
